gw.solr

Class AbstractSolrMessageTransportPlugin

  • gw.solr.AbstractSolrMessageTransportPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject, InitializablePlugin, MessageTransport

    public class AbstractSolrMessageTransportPlugin
implements MessageTransport, InitializablePlugin, _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject
    Base class for a Solr message transport plugin. This type of plugin listens for updates of interest to the related Solr index documents and creates and submits the required Solr update messages.

      • hasRelevantChanges

        boolean hasRelevantChanges(Object root,
                         File configFile)
        Walks a bean graph from it's root, according to the indexing rules in the associated configuration file, and detects if interesting changes are present.
        Parameters:
        root - root of bean graph in which to search for changes.
        configFile - Solr document configuration file containing the indexing rules.
        Returns:
        true if this graph contains changes that require an index update to be sent to Solr, false otherwise.

      • hasRelevantChanges

        boolean hasRelevantChanges(List<Object> roots,
                         File configFile)
        Walks a bean graph from it's root, according to the indexing rules in the associated configuration file, and detects if interesting changes are present.
        Parameters:
        roots - List of roots for the bean graph in which to search for changes.
        configFile - Solr document configuration file containing the indexing rules.
        Returns:
        true if this graph contains changes that require an index update to be sent to Solr, false otherwise.
